summary: A woman married to the brutal and infertile owner of a dye mill in rural China conceives a boy with her husband's nephew but is forced to raise her son as her husband's heir without revealing his parentage in this circular tragedy.
cast: Li Gong|Baotian Li|Wei Li|Zhang Yi|Ji-an Zheng|Ma Chong|Zhijun Cong|Wu Fa|Zhaoji Jia|Jia Jin|Xingli Niu|Qianbin Yang
title: Ju Dou
